  <Settings>
    <Setting key="LongliveAddins">
      <Filter><![CDATA[ ]]></Filter>
      <Choices>
        <Choice percent="100">
          <Value>{
			"VantageCoreAddin":"always",
			"LenovoBoostAddin":"onDemand",
			"LenovoBoostSystemAddin":"onDemand",
			"DeviceSettingsSystemAddin":"always",
			"SmartInteractAddin":"onDemand",
        	"MultimediaAddin":"onDemand",
        	"LenovoServiceBridgeAddin":"onDemand",
			"LenovoGamingSystemAddin":"onDemand",
			"LenovoGamingUserAddin":"onDemand",
            "ThinkSpectrumAddin": "onDemand",
			"LenovoSystemUpdateAddin":"onDemand",
            "LenovoDisplayAddin":"onDemand",
            "SmartDisplayAddin":"onDemand"
		}</Value>
        </Choice>
      </Choices>
    </Setting>
    <Setting key="UndelayedSessionChangeEventAddins">
      <Choices>
        <Choice percent="100">
          <Value>[
			"IdeaNotebookAddin",
			"SmartInteractAddin",
			"LenovoGamingUserAddin",
			"LenovoGamingSystemAddin",
        	"BatteryWidgetAddin",
        	"LenovoBatteryGaugeAddin"
		]</Value>
        </Choice>
      </Choices>
    </Setting>
    <Setting key="VantageServiceSettings">
      <Filter><![CDATA[ ]]></Filter>
      <Choices>
        <Choice percent="100">
          <Value>{
    "event-pump": {
        "undelayed-session-change": {
            "allowed": [
                "IdeaNotebookAddin",
                "SmartInteractAddin",
                "LenovoGamingUserAddin",
                "LenovoGamingSystemAddin",
                "BatteryWidgetAddin",
                "LenovoBatteryGaugeAddin"
            ]
        },
        "process-monitor": {
            "allowed-image-names-lowercase": [
                "lenovovantage.exe",
                "chrome.exe",
                "msedge.exe",
                "firefox.exe",
                "lisssvc.exe"
            ]
        }
    },
    "addin-lifecycle": {
        "keep-alive": {
            "VantageCoreAddin": "always",
            "LenovoGamingSystemAddin": "always",
            "LenovoGamingUserAddin": "always",
            "DeviceSettingsSystemAddin": "always",
            "GenericMessagingAddin": "always",
            "LenovoBoostAddin": "onDemand",
            "LenovoBoostSystemAddin": "onDemand",
            "SmartInteractAddin": "onDemand",
            "MultimediaAddin": "onDemand",
            "LenovoServiceBridgeAddin": "onDemand",
            "ThinkSpectrumAddin": "onDemand",
            "LenovoSystemUpdateAddin": "onDemand",
            "LenovoDisplayAddin": "onDemand",
            "SmartDisplayAddin": "onDemand",
			"LenovoHardwareScanAddin": "onDemand",
        },
        "idle-quota": 5,
        "idle-timeout": {
            "default": 30
        }
    }
}</Value>
        </Choice>
      </Choices>
    </Setting>
  </Settings>
